articles.title: Shipping crisis getting worse - some companies are chartering air cargo planes for R29 million a flight - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Seeking to avoid the shipping crisis, desperate retailers are chartering planes for up to $2 million — sometimes even more — to get their goods shipped from Asia to the US.
articles.content:
The shipping crisis is boosting demand for air cargo, with desperate retailers sending the price of an air freight charter to record levels.

articles.title: AirAsia X proposes paying 0.5% of US$8.1b debt owed to creditors - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) is proposing to pay just 0.5% of debt owed to each of its creditors and to terminate all existing contracts so that it can restructure 33.65 billion ringgit ($8.1 billion) of liabilities, a document seen by Reuters shows.
